page.title: 10Tourists in Mentmore
page.content: The goods in the shop are entirely made by British craftspeople and are displayed to advantage among the old horse boxes. Everything in the tea- room is hand-made by a team of 4 local people and the owner herself rises at 6.30 a.m. to bake the scones, at the same time as curling the butter and preparing the grapefruit for the breakfast of over-night visitors. There are never any empty bedroms. This place caters mostly for businessmen and offers a homely, yet unusual stopover, but they also have honeymooners.{The Stag Hotel,}just up the road, has an excellent restaurant and there is great liaison between these two places. I was asked to stress that Mentmore is a wonderful place and that its residents - some 70 families - are among the world's best.
